WorkItem.Description:
Trying to compile samples w/ gcc 4.6 and -std=c++0x I've got a lot of errors.
The reason is that some structures (particularly pstsdk::attachment_transform) declare a move ctor w/o declaring a copy ctor, which is, according N3053 document, leads to delete default copy ctor, but latter required from time to time when use boost...
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to compile w/ gcc 4.6 in C++11 mode
